text: Kilmarnock Football Club is a professional football club based at Rugby Park in Kilmarnock, Scotland. They were founded in 1869, and are the oldest professional club in Scotland. They currently play in the Scottish Premier League and are managed by Derek McInnes == Current squad == ==Notable former players== * Steven Naismith * Kris Boyd * Alex Burke * Ian Durrant * Alex Burke * John Shaw * Gary Holt * Gus MacPherson * Ally McCoist * Kevin McGowne * Jim McIntyre * Dylan Kerr * Tommy McLean * Gordon Smith * Paul Wright * Dragoje Leković * Gary McSwegan ==Managers== Name Scottish League Scottish Cup Scottish League Cup Promotion from First Division Total 1919–1937 0 2 0 0 1937–1945 0 0 0 0 1945–1947 0 0 0 0 1947–1948 0 0 0 0 1948–1950 0 0 0 0 1950–1957 0 0 0 0 1957–1965 1 0 0 0 1965–1968 0 0 0 0 1968–1973 0 0 0 0 1973–1977 0 0 0 1 1977–1981 0 0 0 1 1981–1984 0 0 0 1 1984–1988 0 0 0 0 1988–1992 0 0 0 0 1992–1994 0 0 0 1 1994–1996 0 0 0 0 1996–2002 0 1 0 0 2002–2010 0 0 0 0 2010 0 0 0 0 2010-2011 0 0 0 0 2011- 0 0 0 0 ==References== Category:Scottish Premier League clubs Category:1869 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:19th-century establishments in Scotland Category:East Ayrshire
